lemma "let P = Atom (0 :: nat); Q = Atom 1; R = Atom 2; T = Atom 3; \<phi> = (\<^bold>\<not>(P \<^bold>\<and> Q)) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (\<^bold>\<not>R \<^bold>\<and> Q); \<psi> = (T \<^bold>\<rightarrow> P) \<^bold>\<or> (T \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (\<^bold>\<not>R)); I = interpolate \<phi> \<psi> in (size I) = 23 \<and> simplify_consts I = Atom 2 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> Atom 0"
